data.comment: The match is underway in Orlando.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 2, Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Portland.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 4, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
Marvin Loria of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 8, Philadelphia push upfield and Sergio Santos gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Portland defence.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Philadelphia's Kacper Przybylko gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sebastian Blanco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
Diego Chara is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Portland.
Portland's Jeremy Ebobisse scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Diego Valeri to set up the goal.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Philadelphia at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
Portland's Diego Chara looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 18, Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Philadelphia's area.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Philadelphia at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Allen Chapman signals a Portland throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Sergio Santos's header is off-target for Philadelphia.
In the minute 26, Portland have a goal kick.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 28, Philadelphia drives forward and Jose Martinez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Portland needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
In the minute 29, Important block from the Philadelphia defence as Jeremy Ebobisse fires in a strike for Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
In the minute 30, Portland drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Philadelphia!
In the minute 36, Philadelphia's Jamiro Monteiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 38, Free kick Portland.
Kai Wagner (Philadelphia) gets a yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Eryk Williamson for Portland who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 39, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eryk Williamson returns to the field for Portland after picking up a slight injury.
Chris Duvall of Portland gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 40, Allen Chapman awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Portland push forward at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and Marvin Loria gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Philadelphia defence.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 41, Portland's Sebastian Blanco gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 45, Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a penalty in Orlando...
In the minute 45, Philadelphia were awarded a penalty ... Which Sergio Santos failed to convert!
Portland have a goal kick.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 45, Allen Chapman signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in Portland.
Philadelphia's Kacper Przybylko is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Philadelphia are pushing forward but Jamiro Monteiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
The first-half is over at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 50, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
Portland to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Allen Chapman signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 52, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 56, Allen Chapman awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Jaroslaw Niezgoda is replacing Jeremy Ebobisse for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Portland make their second substitution with Andy Polo replacing Marvin Loria.
In the minute 58, Portland pushes forward through Diego Valeri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Philadelphia.
Jim Curtin is making the team's first substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Ilsinho replacing Sergio Santos.
In the minute 60, Philadelphia are coming forward and Jamiro Monteiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 61, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Philadelphia attack but Kacper Przybylko's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 64, Portland have a goal kick.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 66, In Orlando Portland drive forward through Jaroslaw Niezgoda. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Allen Chapman signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Portland's half.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Free kick Portland.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Andy Polo for Portland drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Portland.
Great finish from Sebastian Blanco to give Portland a 0-2 lead.
That's a fine assist from Dario Zuparic.
In the minute 72, Portland's Diego Valeri breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 73, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Andrew Wooten is on a sub for Jose Martinez for Philadelphia.
Portland are coming forward and Sebastian Blanco gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Allen Chapman awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to Portland's area.
Throw-in for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 79, Portland needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
Philadelphia's Kacper Przybylko gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Orlando Philadelphia attack through Kacper Przybylko. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Portland have a goal kick.
Portland will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Philadelphia.
In the minute 85, Goal! Philadelphia reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Andrew Wooten.
Philadelphia are caught offside.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a third substitution, with Felipe Mora replacing Sebastian Blanco.
In the minute 88, Allen Chapman signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Portland's half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Bonilla is on a sub for Jorge Villafana for Portland.
In the minute 89, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Mark McKenzie is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Portland to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Mark McKenzie has recovered and rejoins the match in Orlando.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
Portland's Bill Tuiloma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Philadelphia defender.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Allen Chapman signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in Portland.
That's full-time at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. The final score is 1-2.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's fifth substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Bill Tuiloma replacing Diego Valeri.
